body_html:
Sounds like the same issue as #12927. One workaround would be to add "from tensorflow.contrib.seq2seq.python.ops import beam_search_ops" to the graph transform tool so it picks up the kernel.

Not closing this immediately because there may be different solutions. Even if we don't load contrib eagerly we may want to import some contrib kernels in the graph transform tool.

body:
Sounds like the same issue as https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/12927. One workaround would be to add "from tensorflow.contrib.seq2seq.python.ops import beam_search_ops" to the graph transform tool so it picks up the kernel.

Not closing this immediately because there may be different solutions. Even if we don't load contrib eagerly we may want to import some contrib kernels in the graph transform tool.
